name: Symmetry
flavor_text: "Duality is not a curse, but a gift." —Author unknown

frame.name: Revolution
frame.description:
This weapon fires full auto.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to Arc Seeker mode. Arc Seekers track toward combatants you target.

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description: Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
perks.name: Dynamic Charge

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
